溞字的基本解释

溞
sāo
〔溞溞〕淘米声。
洗：“水既洁，然后可以溞身。”

溞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sāo］
［《廣韻》蘇遭切，平豪，心。］
(1)象声词。参见“溞溞”。
(2)洗。

溞字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溞； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页639第35
〔古文〕叜【廣韻】【集韻】蘇遭切【韻會】【正韻】蘇曹切，?音騷。【爾雅·釋訓】溞溞，淅也。【註】淘米聲。【疏】詩大雅：釋之溞溞。【傳】釋淅米也。叟叟聲也。溞叟音異義同。◎按今《詩》本作叟叟。　又【集韻】疎鳩切，音搜。義同。通作溲。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋訓】【疏】詩大雅：淅之溞溞。【傳】釋淅米也。〕　謹照原文淅之改釋之。

溞字的起名意思

暂无。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
sāo
〔Mingming〕 The sound of rice washing.
Washing: "The water is clean, and then the body can be cleaned."
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sāo]
["Guangyun" Su Zuoqie, Pinghao, Xin. ]
(1) Onomatopoeia. See "Mina".
(2) Wash.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溞; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 639 35
〔古文〕叜【广韵】【Jiyun】Su Zuoqie 【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Su Caoqie,? Yin Sao. 【Erya·Shixun】Ming Ming, Xi Ye. [Note] The sound of rice washing. [Sparse] Poetry Daya: Shi Zhiming. [Biography] Shi Xi Mi Ye. The old man's voice is also. The sound of Ming Suo has the same meaning. ◎According to the present version of "Poem", it is an old man.　[Jiyun] Jiujiu cut, sound search. The same meaning. Pass for dew. Textual research: [[Erya·Shixun] [Shu] Poetry Daya: Song Zhi Ming Ming. [Biography] Shi Xi Mi Ye. 〕　I would like to modify the interpretation based on the original text.
